item.title: Make your ubuntu LTS kernel up to date
item.description: Install LTS Hardware Enablement Stack sudo apt-get install --install-recommends linux-generic-hwe-18.04 xserver-xorg-hwe-18.04 Clean sudo apt purge --autoremove Reboot to load new kernel
